snippet.title: Gourmet Warriors (QUByte Classics) | Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One and Xbox Series S|X
snippet.description:
Gourmet Warriors will be available on August 31st as part of QUByte’s Classic line-up for Nintendo Switch, PS4, PS5, Xbox One and Xbox Series S|X

Gourmet Warriors is a surrealistic side-scrolling beat 'em-up originally released in 1995.

The year is 20XX, World War III has occurred and decimated the planet. Recovering from nuclear war has not been easy, as the citizens of Zeus Heaven Magic City, one of the few surviving metropolitan centers, will tell you. Zeus is a world unto itself, a world of power and technology. A world with precious little food supplies. It is imperative to ingest proteins in whatever food you can find on your journey. 

Bath, a secret organization bent on causing strife and violence, is growing their power every day, slowly taking over more and more of the city - including food supplies.

Save the city of Zeus Heaving Magic from the attempt of demonic mutant robots to take over! And eat some tasty gourmet recipes while you're at it!

________________________________________________________

Sobre a QUByte Interactive
A QUByte é a maior editora da América Latina no segmento indie para consoles e possui seu estúdio de desenvolvimento interno, que está trabalhando atualmente em MARS 2120. O objetivo da QUByte é desenvolver a indústria local por meio de parcerias em portabilidade, publicação e desenvolvimento de jogos.

Sobre a PIKO Interactive
Empresa de desenvolvimento e publicação de jogos que se concentra em lançar jogos de vídeo em formato de cartucho para consoles retrô e trazê-los para consoles modernos e PC.

All rights reserved © 2023 QUByte Interactive.
